    • Constructor Detail

      • SapaService.Port

        public SapaService.Port(String name,
                int signalType,
                int inOutType)
                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a Port instance.
        Parameters:
        name - The port name.
        signalType - The signal type.
        Valid values are:
        SIGNAL_TYPE_AUDIO
        SIGNAL_TYPE_MIDI
        inOutType - The data type.
        Valid values are:
        INOUT_TYPE_IN
        INOUT_TYPE_OUT
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Thrown if the parameters passed are not valid.

        public boolean equals(Object obj)
        Check if the port name, data type and signal type of the specified instance and the current instance are equal.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The Port object to compare.
        Returns:
        true - if the port name, data type and signal type of the two instances are the same.
        false - if the port name, data type and signal type of the two instances are not the same.
